traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Unfettered
entries: The living spell can move through any barrier, even a wall of magical force.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The living spell doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Force Blade
entries: {@atk ms} +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 26 (4d12 damage) force damage, unless the living spell rolled an 18 or higher on the {@dice d20} for the attack, in which case the attack is a critical hit that deals 78 (12d12 damage) force damage instead.
